meanings.sent1: She restacks the books neatly on the shelf.
meanings.sent2: After the wind knocked them over, he restacks the chairs outside.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel restacks the acorns in a funny pattern.
meanings.sent4: He restacks his thoughts before making a decision.
meanings.sent5: The child eagerly restacks the building blocks to create a new tower.

meanings.sent1: The restacks of the plates made the kitchen look tidy.
meanings.sent2: He noticed the restacks of the boxes in the storage room.
meanings.sent3: The restacks of the books on the shelf amused the librarian.
meanings.sent4: The restacks of the clouds in the sky created a beautiful sunset.
meanings.sent5: The restacks of the cards in the deck made it easier to play the game.
